questions.question_text:
A company has multiple AWS accounts. The company needs to simplify and consolidate its billing process.

Which AWS service or tool will meet these requirements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
no hay mucho que explicar

Selected Answer: B
B. AWS Organizations

"AWS Organizations is an account management service that enables you to consolidate multiple AWS accounts into an organization that you create and centrally manage. AWS Organizations includes account management and consolidated billing capabilities that enable you to better meet the budgetary, security, and compliance needs of your business. As an administrator of an organization, you can create accounts in your organization and invite existing accounts to join the organization."

https://docs.aws.amazon.com/organizations/latest/userguide/orgs_introduction.html

Selected Answer: B
B is the answer.

questions.question_text: Which AWS service uses machine learning to help discover, monitor, and protect sensitive data that is stored in Amazon S3 buckets?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
https://aws.amazon.com/macie/

Amazon Macie is a data security and data privacy service that uses machine learning (ML) and pattern matching to discover and protect your sensitive data.

A - protect from DDOS 

B - 

C - managed firewall and provides centralized threat detection

D - for user sign-in (AUTH for web/mobile app) 

Answer: B

Selected Answer: B
Aamzon Mcie is the service

Selected Answer: B
Amazon Macie

Selected Answer: B
B. Macie

Selected Answer: B
S3 SECURITY -> MACIE
B.Macie

Selected Answer: B
Amazon Macie is a security service offered by AWS that leverages machine learning algorithms to automatically discover, classify, and protect sensitive data stored in Amazon S3 buckets. It helps organizations identify and understand the content of their S3 data by analyzing the data for sensitive information such as personally identifiable information (PII), financial data, and intellectual property.

Macie uses machine learning models to identify and classify data patterns, enabling the detection of sensitive data even if it is stored in an unstructured format or embedded within larger files. It provides automated alerts and generates reports to assist with data privacy and compliance efforts.

Selected Answer: B
B. Macie

Selected Answer: B
B. Amazon Macie
B. Amazon Macie

B is the answer.

questions.question_text:
A company has a workload that requires data to be collected, analyzed, and stored on premises. The company wants to extend the use of AWS services to run on premises with access to the company network and the company's VPC.

Which AWS service meets this requirement?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
I would go with AWS outposts for this one as more than storage services are needed.
AWS Outposts: Run AWS infrastructure and services on premises for a truly consistent hybrid experience
AWS Storage Gateway: Provide on-premises applications with access to virtually unlimited cloud storage

Selected Answer: A
A. AWS Outposts

Selected Answer: A
A is the answer.

Selected Answer: A
going for A, as Storage (B) is to be on premises.

questions.question_text: Which AWS service provides the ability to host a NoSQL database in the AWS Cloud?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Amazon DynamoDB

"Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed, serverless, key-value NoSQL database designed to run high-performance applications at any scale. DynamoDB offers built-in security, continuous backups, automated multi-Region replication, in-memory caching, and data import and export tools."

https://aws.amazon.com/dynamodb/

Selected Answer: B
B is the answer.

questions.question_text: Which of the following are benefits that a company receives when it moves an on premises production workload to AWS? (Choose two.)

choices.A: AWS trains the company's staff on the use of all the AWS services
choices.B: AWS manages all security in the cloud
choices.C: AWS offers free support from technical account managers (TAMs)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: DE
When a company moves an on-premises production workload to AWS, two benefits it receives are:

D. AWS offers high availability.
E. AWS provides economies of scale.

Selected Answer: DE
D. AWS offers high availability
E. AWS provides economies of scale

Selected Answer: DE
DE is the answer.
